function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Project delays due to pandemic and government-mandated closures, delays in shipments of materials and equipment, challenges finding workers, and smaller work crews due to social distancing requirements.","Impact":"Increased project timelines, financial losses, and potential contract penalties.","Mitigation":"Implementing remote technology for inspections, using virtual public meetings, and adapting bid strategies.","Technologies":"Interactive web-based tools for virtual meetings, remote inspection technology, bid management software.","People":"Contractors, construction workers, project owners, government agencies.","Owner":"Contractors, project owners, government agencies."},{"Description":"Anticipation of future business impact, structural and financial.","Impact":"Financial losses, project cancellations, and business disruptions.","Mitigation":"Adapting project management practices, increasing use of technology, and addressing bid strategies specifically for each project.","Technologies":"Remote project management tools, virtual meeting platforms, bid management software.","People":"Contractors, project managers, business owners.","Owner":"Contractors, project managers, business owners."},{"Description":"Longer project completion times due to safety changes, reduced on-site workforce, and time constraints for new construction projects.","Impact":"Increased project costs, delayed project delivery, and reduced project profitability.","Mitigation":"Considering time constraints when bidding for new projects, addressing bid strategies specifically for each project, implementing safety changes on construction sites.","Technologies":"Bid management software, remote project management tools, safety management software.","People":"Contractors, project managers, construction workers.","Owner":"Contractors, project managers, construction companies."}]}
